topic.title: Number of Infants Born Alive - conformance rules

lines.i: A measure of the number of infants born alive within this delivery.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:344)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:346)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:345)/@code="73773-4" Number of infants in this delivery born alive (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:513)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it captures the number of infants born alive within a delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:347)
The number of infants born alive. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 12.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:344)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:346)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:345)/@code="73773-4" Number of infants in this delivery born alive (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:513)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it captures the number of infants born alive within a delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="INT" (CONF:347)
The number of infants born alive. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 12.
